page.title: 07WHAT WE DO AT SCHOOL
page.content:
{ }We do {Geography,Science,P.E { {Spellings,English,Maths,Art}and{How {We Used to Live.}I like{Swimming}the best, especially with Mrs.Williams.On {Sports}day I really enjoy myself,We have {Red,Green,Blue}and{Yellow.}In sports my colour is {Red.}In craft I do needlework,woodwork and pottery.The worst subjects are{Maths}and Geography and I really hate Reading 360. We go on really good school visits. Last Easter holiday we went to the ISLE OF WIGHT for a week. This term we have been to the Houses of Parliament and we have been down a coal mine in Staffordshire.
{
